participant_1.background:
I like to watch my dolphins swimming in the ocean.
I was a musician before my current job.
i enjoy horseback riding.
i am a full time mom.
i enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.

participant_2.background:
I don't mind the weather because I spend most of my time indoors.
my mom went crazy when i was three and i haven t seen her since.
i have a 7 year old daughter.
I play the harmonica in my spare time.
I'd rather listen to the sounds of nature while walking my dog.

content.text: Hey, good thanks. How are you?
I'm good, thanks! I'm a full time mom and I like to play music and horseback ride.
That's awesome! I like to play the harmonica and I have a seven year old daughter.
That's great! Do you listen to any music while you play the harmonica?
I like to listen to the sounds of nature while I walk my dog.
That sounds nice! I like to watch my dolphins swimming in the ocean.
That's awesome! I don't mind the weather because I spend most of my time indoors.
That's interesting! What do you do indoors?
I play video games and watch TV.
That sounds fun! I like to read and go for walks.
That's great! I like to go for walks too, but I don't have much time these days.
I know what you mean. I'm always busy with my daughter.
Me too. She keeps me on my toes!
Me too! I'm glad we're both moms. It's a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun.
I know what you mean. I love being a mom.
Me too! It's the best job in the world.
